name: ArcheLight
description:
--- Brief ---
"ArcheLight" was created as a prototype for the "Advanced Games Design & Production" Module at Staffordshire University. It's a turn-based, grid-based fantasy RPG where the player takes control of four individual characters who can move around the level and attack enemy characters.

The aim of this project was to test and extend my own knowledge of Unreal Engine 4 and learn more about this genre of game in terms of mechanics and implementation into engine. 

--- Controls ---
WASD - Move Camera
Q/E - Rotate Camera
Scroll Wheel - Zoom In / Out
Mouse Button 1 - Selection / Move Character / Attack Character

--- Install Instructions --- 
To install, click the Download button below, unpack the .zip file anywhere on your computer, and load up the .exe file within. Thank you for playing!
